function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of insight into the presence of sars-cov-2 in wastewater in italy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Excretion of hotspots.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate health insurance coverage for different classes of society.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of inequalities and poverty","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Publication of non-peer reviewed research","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ignoring the possibility of a new spike in cases by easing up with measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust in science predicts risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification of non-unique policy measures in different media reports","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Existential threat to companies in diseases if the database was accessed in a high-risk environment.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analyzing 152 articles for policy measures could pose a early may lead to the gathering of large groups of individuals in physical spaces, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
